Backtest 3X Faster than using Spreadsheets. 

This chrome extension is an extension (who would've thought?) of the TraderEdge backtesting software. 

It allows users to recording their backtesting data and save it. Along with this you can also journal all of your day-to-day trading results!

To signup for a TraderEdge account head to https://www.traderedge.app/

To contact our support email us at support@traderedge.app
